Implication: "Climate scientists were surprised by the warmth of 2017"
Formula: (exists b (IsWarm(b) and IsRemarkablyWarm(b)) & (forall f (forall e (forall d ( IsRemarkablyWarm(d) ->  IsSurprisedBy(e,f))))) & (forall g (forall h (forall i ( IsSurprisedBy(g,h) ->  IsRemarkablyWarm(i)))))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsSurprisedBy(c,a))))
